select m1.moduleid menuid, m1.name menuname, m2.moduleid menuid_two, m2.name menuname_two, m2.url from bss_sys_module m1, bss_sys_module m2
where m2.parentid = m1.moduleid and m1.parentid = '0' and m2.parentid != '0'
and m2.moduleid in(
select bss_sys_rolemodule.moduleid from bss_sys_role,bss_sys_rolesys,bss_sys_rolenode,bss_sys_rolemodule,bss_sys_roleoperate
where bss_sys_role.roleid=bss_sys_rolesys.roleid and bss_sys_rolenode.rsid=bss_sys_rolesys.rsid and bss_sys_rolemodule.rnid=bss_sys_rolenode.rnid and bss_sys_roleoperate.rmid=bss_sys_rolemodule.rmid and bss_sys_role.roleid=#{roleid} ) order by m1.showorder,m2.showorder
